name: Band of Mercenaries
description:
Band of Mercenaries is a 4-player local arena game. One-hit often means one death sOoo... So you should better build the best team of mercenaries !



The game is designed around two phases: First you make your team, then you fight !

For now there is a unique game mode called "Mercato".

Game Mode "Mercato":

In this mode, you fight in a region with 4 battles.
Before each battle, you get your mercenaries in a betting phase. Mercenaries are presented to the players and they join the highest bidder. Then you fight like every arena game ! The player or coalition (if you play with teams) with the most battles won is declared the winner ! To spice things up, losers get one more coin after each battle and additionnal coins can be earned at the end of certain battles if you complete optionnal objectives.

Band of Mercenaries is intended to improve geek nights, parties with friends, social gathering and resolve couples fighting or conflicts between roomates, brothers and sisters or even citizens.

Global features:

⦁ 2 to 4 Players in local multiplayer or online with the Steam feature "Remote Play Together" (NO SINGLE PLAYER MODE for now)


⦁ 15 mercenaries with their own unique play style

⦁ 3 regions of 4 maps (with different optionnal objectives)

⦁ A fresh Medieval/Fantasy world

⦁ Pixel art animation made by hand

⦁ Two players can play on the same keyboard + controller support
